## createContextFromEnv() function

Create a StyleContext from an EnvironmentAdapter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function createContextFromEnv(env: EnvironmentAdapter): StyleContext;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

env


</td><td>

[EnvironmentAdapter](./core.environmentadapter.md)


</td><td>

Environment adapter to use for color detection


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[StyleContext](./chapstick.stylecontext.md)

A StyleContext with proper color support

## Remarks

This is useful for initializing the style context from a platform adapter's environment.

## Example


```typescript
import { createNodePlatform } from '@boba-cli/machine/node'
import { createContextFromEnv, setDefaultContext } from '@boba-cli/chapstick'

const platform = createNodePlatform()
setDefaultContext(createContextFromEnv(platform.environment))
```
